item.title: Trump to call on federal agencies to cancel Harvard contracts
item.description: The White House will send a letter to federal agencies asking them to identify any contracts with Harvard and cancel them, according to a senior admin...

item.title: WATCH: Macron responds after apparent shove from first lady caught on camera
item.description: French President Emmanel Macron was preparing to step off his plane in Vietnam when his wife allegedly gripped his face and shoved him backward.

item.title: Consumer confidence brightens as Trump rolls back tariffs
item.description: The survey ends five consecutive months of dampening consumer confidence.

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: Former Combs assistant testifies
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs is standing trial on sex trafficking and racketeering charges in a case that has captured widespread attention.
